entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with a few showers beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 late this afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries and ending near midnight then clearing. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
